story.text: (Adds details)Jan 3 (Reuters) - Raymond James said it raised U.S. futures exchanges Chicago Mercantile Exchange Inc. CME.N and CBOT Holdings Inc. BOT.N to "outperform" from "marketperform." The recent retrenchment in shares of Chicago Mercantile and CBOT Holdings may relate to possible anti-trust concerns regarding their proposed combination, but the management is confident about closing the deal, the brokerage said. Raymond James has a price target of $171 on CBOT Holdings and $570 on Chicago Mercantile. (Reporting by Isha Jha in Bangalore)
story.title: update 1 - research alert - raymond james raises cme , cbot
